name: Puzzle Castle
description:
Puzzle Castle is a 3D puzzle platformer.   Explore an ancient and mysterious castle filled with Interesting  puzzles.  Puzzle castle features a simple set of rules inspired by the classic Japanese game Sokoban, 42 handcrafted puzzles,  and a spooky yet calming atmosphere.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement

U - to Undo

R - to Reset a level

ESC - to quit the game (There is no way to save progress yet)

Attributions: (I'll add these to the demo when i patch it later on)

Lake Ambient sound

Pure Water by Meydän (Title Screen music)

Additional sound effects
